name: Bendy Duration Lines
description: Makes duration lines in the editor more accurate!

cull-offscreen.name: Cull Offscreen Triggers
cull-offscreen.description: When this is enabled, offscreen triggers will not have their duration lines calculated and drawn - this means you won't be able to see their duration line for lengthy triggers, but will improve performance.

precision.name: Line Precision (seconds)
precision.description:
Each part of each duration line is split up into segments of this length in seconds to get the position of that segment at that point in time.
Higher numbers = less precise = higher performance
